max_history_for_hints.description: When loading hints, the maximum amount of entries in the history that Monolith scans.

do_not_quit.description: Do not quit Monolith when all windows are closed.

save_complete_page.description: When saving a web page, save it with resources like images and JavaScript.

disallow_clipboard_read.description: Don't allow sites to read your clipboard.

crash_tabs_on_close.description: When closing a tab, crash its process so the history remains even when you open a closed tab. May introduce bugs as some processes are shared by multiple tabs.

experimental_beforeunload.description: Use the experimental version of 'beforeunload' event: it can only be cancelled with .preventDefault()

backup_tabs_interval.description: How often should Monolith save currently opened tabs so that they can be opened upon next launch. (ms)

open_devtools_for_window.description: WARNING! This feature may expose you to vulnerabilities. Should Developer tools be opened for the chrome of the window.

disallow_http.description: When HTTPS Only is enabled, completely prevent HTTP connections instead of redirecting to HTTPS.
